description:
Nina thought Vendetta invited her to the slumber party to watch late-night movies. But Vendetta has something else in mind! She has Nina go down on her while being fucked by the Annihilator. Then she assfucks Nina with a strap-on while Nina is being fucked by the Crystal Palace. After a ride on the Twinserter together, Vendetta finally has Nina suck her toes while Vendetta gets fucked by the MiniMite. Sure beats watching "Love Boat" reruns :)
Also: don't miss the "double-ended titsuckers", made specially for this shoot!
title: Nina and Vendetta
